reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Economic Political and Social Empowernment of Women through savings-led microfinance

description.narrative: Poverty affects women more than men because it reinforces other types of social exclusion based on gender. Alleviating poverty does not end with meeting basic materail needs but by challenging and redressing the causes and consequences of poverty and unfai r systems and structures that contribute to persistent poverty. It is essential to help the very poor help themselves to change their sistuation. Such empowerment can lead to broad sustainable development in the community. There is need for self-managed se lf savings-led approaches that are intentionally designed to meet the needs of the very poor women which offer low cost services that serve extremely poor households sustainably. The action aims to address the challenges of the most poor by assisting extre mely poor women in Mtwapa to better engage in viable and sustainable income generation and business activities by a savings-led approach. The approach will improve the participation of women in broad social development activities in their communities
